title: Patching issues, errors as follow
body:
I received the following errors that appear to have caused the client to fail to patch. This is after having played nearly 10 games on the patch. I'm lucky that this didn't happen mid-game.

I've checked the one firewall that is enabled, and nothing has been blocked.
If anyone can help me troubleshoot, lemme know.


000246.814|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::TryGetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(769): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA'.
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(842): File not found, HTTP response code 504, while retrieving file:'/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA'.
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::RetrieveReleaseListing: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerCommon.cpp(46): Failed to download listing file from "/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA" to temp file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP3b71.tmp"
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::RemoteFileServerHTTP::EnumerateAvailableReleasesForRegion: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerHTTP.cpp(118): Error retrieving release listing
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared::ChooseSolutionVersion: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared.cpp(268): Failed to enumerate available releases.
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateSolution: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateSolution.cpp(607): Failed to choose a target version
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::`anonymous-namespace'::InstallLatestSolutionRelease: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(208): Failure or interruption while updating
000276.481|   OKAY| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::AddProjectUpdateMetrics: project_update_metrics_internal_message_identifier : game - Update Time 59.7 sec, Downloaded 0 Bytes, Avg 0 BytesPerSec. Result: failure.
000276.481|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::DoUpdateGame: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(451): Failed to install latest game client.

replies.body: Are you still having an issue?  There was a patching issue, but everything should be fine now.  Let me know!
The issue was fixed. Thank you for following up!
